title: In-N-Out promotes 'giant shindig' 75th anniversary festival 11 months early
dc:creator: Noah Goldberg
description: In-N-Out Burger will celebrate 75 years of feeding burger lovers with a 'giant shindig' at Pomona Raceway.
content:encoded: In-N-Out Burger will celebrate 75 years of feeding burger lovers with a 'giant shindig' at Pomona Raceway.

media:content.media:description: The flagship In'n'Out Burger is just off the 10 freeway in Baldwin Park, L.A. County, and it's neighbored by a company store and an In'n'Out University.
